Title: Billie Jean
Description: Iconic pop masterpiece with irresistible bass line and revolutionary music video that launched MTV era.

Title: Purple Rain
Description: Epic rock ballad showcasing Prince's guitar virtuosity and emotional depth with orchestral arrangements.

Title: Like a Virgin
Description: Provocative pop anthem that established Madonna as the Queen of Pop with catchy hooks and bold imagery.

Title: Hungry Like the Wolf
Description: New wave classic with exotic percussion, slap bass, and cinematic music video filmed in Sri Lanka.

Title: Just Can't Get Enough
Description: Infectious synth-pop track with bright melodies and danceable electronic beats that defined the decade.

Title: Love Song
Description: Jangly pop gem showcasing Robert Smith's softer side with romantic lyrics and uplifting guitar work.

Title: Blue Monday
Description: Revolutionary electronic dance track that became the UK's biggest-selling 12-inch single of all time.

Title: Call Me
Description: High-energy rock anthem from American Gigolo soundtrack featuring driving guitars and Debbie Harry's iconic vocals.

Title: Let's Dance
Description: Mainstream pop crossover hit produced by Nile Rodgers with irresistible funk groove and commercial appeal.

Title: Another One Bites the Dust
Description: Bass-driven funk rock anthem that dominated dance floors and became one of Queen's biggest hits.

Title: Take On Me
Description: Norwegian synth-pop sensation with distinctive falsetto vocals and groundbreaking pencil-sketch music video.

Title: Everybody Wants to Rule the World
Description: Anthemic new wave hit exploring themes of power and ambition with lush production and memorable hooks.

Title: Don't You (Forget About Me)
Description: Simple Minds' powerful rock ballad that became synonymous with The Breakfast Club movie soundtrack.

Title: Time After Time
Description: Heartfelt ballad showcasing Lauper's vocal range and emotional depth beyond her quirky pop persona.

Title: Rich Girl
Description: Smooth soul-pop track featuring catchy harmonies and discussing materialism in relationships.

Title: Burning Down the House
Description: Funk-influenced art rock with David Byrne's quirky vocals and Tina Weymouth's prominent bass lines.

Title: We Got the Beat
Description: Energetic all-female band anthem with punky attitude and irresistible pop sensibilities.

Title: Love Is a Battlefield
Description: Power rock anthem with military-themed video and Benatar's powerhouse vocals delivering emotional intensity.

Title: Don't Stop Believin'
Description: Stadium rock epic that became a generational anthem with soaring vocals and inspirational lyrics.

Title: I Want to Know What Love Is
Description: Emotional power ballad featuring gospel choir and exploring themes of love and vulnerability.

Title: Uptown Girl
Description: Retro-styled pop song inspired by Frankie Valli and the Four Seasons with charming romantic lyrics.

Title: In the Air Tonight
Description: Atmospheric track with the most famous drum break in pop history and haunting electronic production.

Title: Invisible Touch
Description: Pop-rock hit showcasing Phil Collins' vocals with sophisticated production and memorable synthesizer work.

Title: Every Breath You Take
Description: Deceptively dark song about obsession disguised as a love ballad with Sting's hypnotic bass line.

Title: Summer of '69
Description: Nostalgic rock anthem celebrating youth and good times with powerful guitar riffs and sing-along chorus.

Title: Livin' on a Prayer
Description: Arena rock classic about working-class struggles with talk-box effects and anthemic choruses.

Title: Pour Some Sugar on Me
Description: Hard rock party anthem with layered vocals and guitar harmonies that defined 80s metal.

Title: Sweet Child O' Mine
Description: Guitar-driven rock ballad featuring Slash's iconic riff and Axl Rose's distinctive vocal range.

Title: Jump
Description: Keyboard-driven rock anthem marking the band's transition to a more pop-oriented sound.

Title: You Shook Me All Night Long
Description: High-voltage rock anthem with Brian Johnson's debut vocals and Malcolm Young's driving rhythm guitar.

Title: Here I Go Again
Description: Power ballad with David Coverdale's bluesy vocals and memorable guitar solos about self-reliance.

Title: The Final Countdown
Description: Epic synth-rock anthem with orchestral keyboards and soaring vocals that became a stadium favorite.

Title: Africa
Description: Sophisticated pop-rock track with complex harmonies and percussion celebrating the African continent.

Title: Hard to Say I'm Sorry
Description: Smooth rock ballad showcasing the band's softer side with lush orchestration and emotional vocals.

Title: Can't Fight This Feeling
Description: Power ballad about overwhelming emotions with Kevin Cronin's heartfelt vocals and piano-driven arrangement.

Title: Mr. Roboto
Description: Theatrical rock opera excerpt with vocoder effects and Dennis DeYoung's dramatic storytelling.

Title: Heat of the Moment
Description: Progressive rock supergroup's biggest hit with John Wetton's powerful vocals and Steve Howe's guitar work.

Title: Owner of a Lonely Heart
Description: Commercial breakthrough combining progressive rock complexity with accessible pop production by Trevor Horn.

Title: Drive
Description: Melancholic synth-pop ballad featuring Benjamin Orr's smooth vocals and atmospheric keyboard textures.

Title: Whip It
Description: Quirky new wave hit with robotic vocals and synthesizer-driven energy that epitomized 80s alternative.

Title: Cars
Description: Influential electronic track with cold synthesizers and deadpan vocals that predicted synth-pop's future.

Title: Computer World
Description: Pioneering electronic music exploring technology themes with precise German engineering and minimalist aesthetics.

Title: Enola Gay
Description: Synth-pop track about the atomic bomb with catchy melodies contrasting its serious historical subject matter.

Title: Vienna
Description: Dramatic synth-pop epic with Midge Ure's emotive vocals and lush electronic orchestration.

Title: True
Description: Romantic soul-influenced ballad with Tony Hadley's powerful vocals and sophisticated jazz-funk arrangements.

Title: Karma Chameleon
Description: Colorful pop anthem with Boy George's distinctive vocals and harmonica prominently featured throughout.

Title: Wake Me Up Before You Go-Go

Title: Venus

Title: Sweet Dreams (Are Made of This)

Title: Tainted Love

Title: Only You
Description: Melancholic synth-pop featuring Alison Moyet's soulful vocals over Vince Clarke's electronic arrangements.

Title: West End Girls
Description: Sophisticated synth-pop commentary on London life with Neil Tennant's conversational vocals and electronic textures.

Title: Don't You (Forget About Me)
Description: Anthemic rock ballad from The Breakfast Club soundtrack with Jim Kerr's passionate vocals.

Title: Need You Tonight

Title: Down Under
Description: Australian anthem with distinctive flute solo and Colin Hay's vocals celebrating national identity.

Title: Beds Are Burning
Description: Political rock anthem about Aboriginal land rights with Peter Garrett's intense vocals and driving rhythm.

Title: Love Shack
Description: Party anthem with call-and-response vocals, surf guitar, and Kate Pierson's distinctive backing vocals.

Title: Heart of Glass

Title: Walk Like an Egyptian

Title: Edge of Seventeen

Title: Barracuda

Title: Don't Stop

Title: All Night Long (All Night)

Title: Master Blaster (Jammin')

Title: Upside Down
Description: Disco-funk track produced by Chic with Bernard Edwards' bass and Nile Rodgers' guitar work.

Title: Celebration

Title: You Dropped a Bomb on Me

Title: Jam on It

Title: We Are Family

Title: I'm Every Woman

Title: I'll Be Gone
